game.name: Birds Organized Neatly
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Touch Only Option, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 여러분은 이 2D 퍼즐 게임에서 그리드에 맞는 방식으로 조류 친구들을 배열하는 역할을 맡게 됩니다. Birds Organized Neatly에는 손으로 직접 제작한 80가지 스테이지와 수많은 모양과 크기를 가진 새 무리로 퍼즐을 풀 수 있습니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In this 2D puzzle game, you have the responsibility to arrange your avian friends in a way that fits the grid. Birds Organized Neatly comes with 80 different handcrafted levels and a whole bunch of birds in all shapes and sizes.

reviewHighlights.text: Not only you have original 80 puzzles to solve - you can also return daily for another one! Most of dailies are quite easy, but - that's exactly what'...
If you hadn't heard you heard it here. Bird bird bird BIRD IS THE WORD!
